newsitem.title: CANADA: Voisey Bay, Atlanta post results.
newsitem.headline: Voisey Bay, Atlanta post results.

text.p: Geologists hired by Voisey Bay Resources Inc and Atlanta Gold Corp said on Thursday that their joint venture gold property in Indonesia contains "encouraging" values.
The consulting geologists studied the companies' 4,016-hectare property in the Kalimantan area, the companies said in a joint statement.
The consultants compiled historical data and previous reports filed with the Indonesian Ministry of Mines.
Work done in the 1980s includes analysis of more than 900 stream sediment samples, 209 host rock samples and 69 mineralized outcrop samples.
Previous testing on the property has shown free gold as well as 10 stream sediment samples with more than 20 ounces of gold per ton including one of 95 grams per ton, the companies said.
Previous sampling has shown outcrop samples that contain up to seven grams of gold per ton and up to 0.8 percent copper, one percent zinc and 0.7 percent lead.
"These values are encouraging and drilling to determine the extent of the deposits is planned to commence as soon as possible," the companies said.
